questions.question: 7. Choose the correct statement from the following.

explanations.c: While the size of the driving inverter can have a significant impact on the overall performance, the sizes of the preceding inverters also play a role in determining the overall delay and signal integrity.
explanations.d: In a series connection of inverters, it is common practice to make the size of the inverter driving the load larger than the previous inverters. By increasing its size, the driving inverter can provide sufficient driving strength to the load and compensate for any voltage drop or delay introduced by the preceding inverters. The size of the driving inverter is typically some multiple of the size of the previous inverters to ensure proper signal propagation.
